title: Unna Partha Neram Lyrics All In All Azhagu Raja Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Unna Partha Neram
Singer(s): Vijay Yesudas, Sri Vardhini
Movie: All In All Azhagu Raja
Music: Thamman S
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar

Unna paatha neram,
manasu aadum mayilaatam.
unna nenacha neram,
nenjil malarumpoonthottam

Karaigalai udaipathu nadhiye
kanavinil dhinam marupadiye
iraivanum ezhudhiya vidhiye
pani vizhum malarvana kiliye

Sari gama padha ne sa
surangalum neeye ..
idhalgalil paravidum paravasam neeye
nazhuvudhu manam
idhu navarasa dhinam
idhu dhinam dhinam pudhu pudhu
sugam sugamey .. (Unna paatha.)

namdhamdham dhandham sugam
kanavukulle veesum manam
adi vaanilaa ini thaenilaa
thithikkum thaeney pala
Sugam kannilaa, ..kayilaa
nenjukkul kadhal vizha

suda suda paravidum sugangalum neeye
thavamindri kidaithidum varangalum neeye

mayakangal varum
pudhu thayakangal tharum
ini dhinam dhinam pudhu pudhu
sugam sugamey

dham dham dhadham
kannasaivil seidhaai vadham
namdham dham dhandham vasandham
en manadhu undhan vasam

en dhevadhai idhal madhulai
sithena vasal silai
varum vaan mazhai adhu thaen mazhai
mundhaanai yaavum kudai

thoda thoda thodardhidum thordaikadhai neeye
idhalgalin idai ulla vidugadhai neeye

ini dhinam dhinam pudhu pudhu
sugam sugamey

Unna paatha neram,
manasu aadum mayilaatam.
unna nenacha neram,
nenjil malarumpoonthottam
category: Song:Unna Partha Neram - All In All Azhagu Raja
